content:
Over the past day, on March 23, Russian troops fired at the territory of 12 regions of Ukraine.

About thisinformsMilitary Media Center.

"In general, from different types of weapons - mortars, tanks, artillery, RSZV, UAV, SCR, tactical aviation - 112 settlements and 85 infrastructure sites were attacked," the statement reads.

Among the civilians are dead and injured, the number of victims is clarified.

As reportedArmyinform, the enemy made almost 450 beats in the Zaporozhye region a day.
title: From mortars, tanks and artillery, Rosarmia attacked 12 regions of Ukraine
description: About it reports Military Media Center. “In general, from different types of weapons - mortars, ...
author: Army Inform
